references.paper_title: The colonial origins of comparative development: An empirical investigation
references.reason: This paper provides real-world data used in the experimental results section to validate the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Mendelian randomization with invalid instruments: effect estimation and bias detection through Egger regression
references.reason: This paper is frequently cited in the introduction as one of the foundational papers for Mendelian randomization with invalid instruments, and is used as a comparison method for evaluating the proposed algorithm.

references.paper_title: A review of instrumental variable estimators for Mendelian randomization
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive review of instrumental variable estimators, which are crucial to understanding the theoretical foundation of the proposed method and relevant to the choice of IV estimator used in the paper.

references.paper_title: Simultaneous estimation of bi-directional causal effects and heritable confounding from GWAS summary statistics
references.reason: This paper addresses the challenging problem of estimating bi-directional causal effects, a topic directly relevant to the research presented in the paper and is compared with the proposed method in the experimental results.

references.paper_title: A focusing framework for testing bi-directional causal effects with GWAS summary data
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel focusing framework for testing bi-directional causal effects, which directly relates to the main focus of the paper and is used as another comparison method in the experimental section.
